data.title: Everything you need to know about Dev Patel's new film, Monkey Man
data.meta_description: Dev Patel's new film, Monkey Man, is coming and from the release date to the trailer and cast, here's everything you need to know.
data.text:
If you're as big of a fan of Dev Patel as we are, then get ready because he's set to star in an explosive new action movie, Monkey Man.

The film, which Dev also produced and directed, follows an amateur fighter seeking revenge against the corrupt leaders who murdered his mother and target the underclasses of society. Think fight scenes, shoot outs and thrilling tension!

We can't wait to watch Dev's directorial debut so, from the cast to the trailer and release date, here is everything you need to know about Monkey Man.

What is Monkey Man about?

The synopsis for the film is as follows, "Inspired by the Hindu legend of Hanuman, an icon embodying strength and courage, Monkey Man stars Patel as Kid, an anonymous young man who ekes out a meager living in an underground fight club where, night after night, wearing a gorilla mask, he is beaten bloody by more popular fighters for cash.

"After years of suppressed rage, Kid discovers a way to infiltrate the enclave of the cityâ€™s sinister elite. As his childhood trauma boils over, his mysteriously scarred hands unleash an explosive campaign of retribution to settle the score with the men who took everything from him."

Who is in the cast of Monkey Man?

We've got an all-Asian cast full of new and upcoming talent in the film, which is set in South Asia, including:

Dev Patel

Sharlto Copley

Pitobash

Vipin Sharma

Sikandar Kher

Sobhita Dhulipala

Ashwini Kalsekar

Adithi Kalkunte

Makarand Deshpande

Alongside starring in the film, Dev is also credited as a screenplay writer, producer and director. Plus, the iconic Jordan Peele also worked as a producer on Monkey Man.

What is the release date for Monkey Man?

Mark your calendars, because Monkey Man is coming to cinemas on 5th April!

Is there a trailer for Monkey Man?

There is! The action-packed trailer sees Dev's character on his journey of revenge and includes brutal fight scenes, chases and more, with the iconic party song, 'Mundian to Bach Ke' by Punjabi MC and Jay-Z, playing in the background.

Watch the trailer here:

Monkey Man is in cinemas from 5th April.
